alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 7:08PM MST until March 08 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Parts of Larimer County such as Fort Collins, and parts of northwestern Weld county. * WHEN...Starting 10 PM MST tonight until 10 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will become slippery in spots, especially bridges and overpasses. Use caution when traveling. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Sidewalks may be icy and very slippery. Walk on grassy areas or avoid sidewalks if icy.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
